member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Global.Opc.WinForms.Core.CtrlOpcBase.ValueFromObjectToPlc(System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Write the item value back to the PLC
member.param: Name of the item to be written
member.remarks: tagName should be the name of the item. If the item is type of GlobalOPCElement item name would be the tag name itself. Otherwise, the item name would be the item itself not including the tag name.

member.summary: Create a copy of all values in the object
member.returns: A clone copy of the object

member.summary: Test if the class is serializable.

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Global.Opc.WinForms.Core.CtrlOpcBase.SetPropertyFilter(System.String@)
member.summary: Use to extend the filter to include any unnecessary items for the opc communication in the class
member.remarks: There is already a pre-defined filter already. If there are more items needed to be removed, this function needs to be call

example.code: Protected Overrides Function SetPropertyFilter(ByRef addedFilters As String) As String() addedFilters += "Source_Washer,Recirculation_Destination,Estimated_Pieces,Soiled_Weight" Return MyBase.SetPropertyFilter(addedFilters) End Function

member.summary: This is where the handshaking takes place
member.param: Value of the item that has this property index

member.summary: Write the item value back to the PLC
member.param: Name of the item to be written
member.remarks: tagName should be the name of the item. If the item is type of GlobalOPCElement item name would be the tag name itself. Otherwise, the item name would be the item itself not including the tag name.

member.summary: Create a copy of all values in the object

member.summary: Test if the class is serializable.

member.name: M:Wdw_Sust.Textile.Global.Opc.WinForms.ComponentOpcBase.SetPropertyFilter(System.String@)
member.summary: Use to extend the filter to include any unnecessary items for the opc communication in the class
member.remarks: There is already a pre-defined filter already. If there are more items needed to be removed, this function needs to be call

example.code: Protected Overrides Function SetPropertyFilter(ByRef addedFilters As String) As String() addedFilters += "Source_Washer,Recirculation_Destination,Estimated_Pieces,Soiled_Weight" Return MyBase.SetPropertyFilter(addedFilters) End Function
